meaningMnemonic: The radical <radical>yellow</radical> and the kanji <kanji>yellow</kanji> are exactly the same!
readingMnemonic: You're in a room, surrounded completely by <kanji>yellow</kanji>. You can't get out. Somewhere in the room is a yellow <reading>key</reading> (き) but you can't find it, because everything looks the same. You crawl around trying to find this tiny thing so that you can escape.
